text: Rafiqul Haque (known as Dadu Bhai; born 1937) is a Bangladeshi journalist. He is reputed for his rhymes. Currently he works in the daily Jugantor, published from Dhaka as its Feature Editor. Earlier he had been the Executive Editor of the Dainik Rupali, Dainik Azad, Dainik Janata and Dainik lal Sabuj, also published from Dhaka. He was the acting editor of the Kishore Bangla from 1976 to 1983, the only weekly newspaper for the children ever published on the Indian sub-continent.ছড়াকার রফিকুল হক দাদু ভাইয়ের জন্মদিন আজ ==References== Category:Living people Category:1937 births Category:Bangladeshi male writers Category:Bangladeshi journalists Category:Bengali poets
